title: Sky Captain and The World of Tomorrow movie poster
author: signs79

comments.content:
You could approximate this look with bold condensed weights of Radiant, available from many foundries. In fact, I think that's what "Gwyneth Paltrow" and "Summer 2004" are set in.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/radiant/rr-bold-condensed-altern...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211003/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/radiant/rr-bold-condensed-alternate/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/radiant/rr-bold-condensed-alternate/")

Font Bureau's Roxy is another option:

[http://fontbureau.com/fonts/sans/Roxy/charset](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211003/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/sans/Roxy/charset "http://fontbureau.com/fonts/sans/Roxy/charset")

It has the rounded A you'll need.

Well, I did say "approximate" -- more than three years ago! :)

What prompted this resurrection?
